hero.title: Master Trading with AI-Powered Insights
hero.subtitle: Transform your trading strategy with real-time market analysis, personalized AI recommendations, and comprehensive learning resources.

about.title: About TradeIQ
about.description: TradeIQ combines cutting-edge artificial intelligence with comprehensive market analysis to help traders make informed decisions. Our platform provides real-time insights, personalized recommendations, and educational resources to enhance your trading journey.

ai.title: AI-Powered Analysis
ai.description: Advanced algorithms analyze market patterns and provide actionable insights

realtime.title: Real-Time Data
realtime.description: Live market data and instant notifications for trading opportunities

learning.title: Learning Resources
learning.description: Comprehensive guides and tutorials to improve your trading skills

smart.title: Smart Trading
smart.description: Make data-driven decisions with AI-powered market analysis

education.title: Continuous Learning
education.description: Access educational content and improve your trading knowledge

support.title: Expert Support
support.description: Get help from our team of trading experts and analysts

learning.title: Master Trading with Our Learning Platform
learning.description: Access comprehensive courses, tutorials, and real-world examples to enhance your trading skills.

login.title: Welcome Back
login.subtitle: Sign in to your TradeIQ account
login.passwordUpdated: Password updated successfully! You can now sign in with your new password.

errors.emailNotConfirmed: Please check your email and click the verification link before signing in
errors.tooManyRequests: Too many login attempts. Please try again later
errors.userNotFound: No account found with this email address
errors.invalidEmail: Please enter a valid email address
errors.signInFailed: Sign in failed. Please try again

signup.title: Create Your Account
signup.subtitle: Start your trading journey with TradeIQ
signup.terms: By creating an account, you agree to our Terms of Service and Privacy Policy
signup.checkEmail: Check your email for a verification link to complete your registration.

errors.emailExists: An account with this email already exists
errors.passwordTooShort: Password must be at least 8 characters long
errors.invalidEmail: Please enter a valid email address
errors.signUpFailed: Sign up failed. Please try again
errors.weakPassword: Password should be at least 8 characters with uppercase, lowercase, number and special character

resetPassword.title: Reset Password
resetPassword.subtitle: Enter your email to reset your password
resetPassword.checkEmail: Check your email for a link to reset your password.
resetPassword.validatingTokenDescription: Please wait while we verify your password reset link.
resetPassword.tokenValidatedDescription: You can now set your new password.
resetPassword.successMessage: Your password has been successfully updated.
resetPassword.successDescription: Your password has been updated. You can now sign in with your new password.
resetPassword.passwordTooShort: Password must be at least {{minLength}} characters long
resetPassword.passwordNeedsUppercase: Password must contain at least one uppercase letter
resetPassword.passwordNeedsLowercase: Password must contain at least one lowercase letter
resetPassword.passwordNeedsNumber: Password must contain at least one number
resetPassword.passwordNeedsSpecial: Password must contain at least one special character
resetPassword.passwordRequirementsHint: Password must be at least 8 characters with uppercase, lowercase, number and special character
resetPassword.linkExpiredDescription: This password reset link has expired. Please request a new one.
resetPassword.sessionExpiredDescription: Your reset session has expired. Please request a new password reset link.
resetPassword.invalidLinkDescription: This password reset link is invalid or has been used. Please request a new one.
resetPassword.unexpectedError: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again.

errors.invalidEmail: Please enter a valid email address
errors.resetFailed: Failed to send reset email. Please try again
errors.userNotFound: No account found with this email address

verifyEmail.title: Verify Your Email
verifyEmail.subtitle: Please check your email and click the verification link
verifyEmail.checkEmail: We've sent a verification link to your email address. Please check your inbox and click the link to verify your account.
verifyEmail.alreadyVerified: Your email is already verified. You can now sign in to your account.
verifyEmail.verifiedDescription: Your email has been successfully verified. You can now sign in to your account.
verifyEmail.resendDescription: Please check your email for the verification link.
